description: GDSC IIIT Hyderabad is a non-profit developer group powered by Google Developers to learn, share, connect and develop skills. By joining the GDSC, students grow their knowledge in a peer-to-peer learning environment and build solutions for local businesses and their communities.
tasks: Overseeing and guiding the analyzing, writing, building, and deployment of software to promote the Google Developer spirit amongst the institute.
Managing the complete software development process from conception to deployment
